```{r}
toluca_data = read.csv("toluca_data.csv")
toluca.reg = lm(workhrs~lotsize, data=toluca_data)
summary(toluca.reg)
```

```{r}
t = 3.57/0.347
print(t)
```


```{r}
pr_t = 1-pt(10.29, 23)
print(pr_t)
```
 
```{r}
help("confint")
confint(toluca.reg)
```


```{r}
confint(toluca.reg, level=0.99)
```

Note: Not expected to do it this way:
```{r}

```
